I have now successfully compiled and run Cantera in Python. To do this I ha=
d to edit the 
preconfig file to stop it using sundials (USE_SUNDIALS=3D${U=
SE_SUNDIALS:=3D'n'}).

It would be nice to have sensitivity analysis, so if=
 anyone can help me build Cantera with 
Sundials I'd be very grateful. 

Ri=
chard
